About me

Hi y'all! My name's Roosevelt I'm a junior studying Computer Science with an emphasis in games at the University of Southern California.

I primarily work with gameplay and tools programming, but am also experienced in level and systems design. I believe in gameplay-first design and am interested in facilitating collaboration between programmers and designers to develop tools and workflows that work for everyone.

I've previously interned at Raw Thrills where I worked in the arcade industry as a programmer and game designer. I have also previously been the programming lead at two game development groups at USC: Open Alpha and Rat Economy, the later of which I co-founded.

I'm currently hard at work on my next big project, stay tuned!

Contact Me

I'm always looking for new challenges. If you think I could help with your project, or just want to chat, reach out to me at hey@roosevelt.games
